statements: SELECT * FROM game_maps;
SELECT map_id, map_name FROM game_maps WHERE map_name = 'Forest';
SELECT map_name, level_design FROM game_maps WHERE map_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM game_maps ORDER BY map_name DESC;
SELECT map_id, map_name FROM game_maps WHERE level_design->>'difficulty' = 'hard';
SELECT * FROM game_maps WHERE map_name = 'Desert Map';
SELECT map_id, map_name FROM game_maps WHERE map_name LIKE '%Jungle%';
SELECT * FROM game_maps WHERE level_design ->> 'difficulty' = 'Hard' ORDER BY map_name DESC;
SELECT map_id, map_name, jsonb_pretty(level_design) AS formatted_design FROM game_maps ORDER BY map_name;
SELECT map_id, map_name FROM game_maps WHERE map_id IN (SELECT map_id FROM game_players WHERE player_id = '123456') LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM game_maps;
SELECT map_name FROM game_maps ORDER BY map_name ASC;
SELECT map_id, map_name FROM game_maps WHERE map_id = '1386c495-77a0-4fd6-87d9-ea74c1b7e682';
SELECT map_name FROM game_maps WHERE map_name ILIKE 'Dungeon%';
SELECT * FROM level_designs WHERE level_number > 5 ORDER BY level_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_maps WHERE map_name = 'Map 1';
SELECT map_id, map_name FROM game_maps ORDER BY map_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM level_designs L JOIN game_maps M ON L.map_id = M.map_id WHERE L.level_number = 1;
SELECT design_data FROM level_designs WHERE map_id = 'dbe56df7-c5a3-4ba0-a9d9-e4dcbf1e7ed1';
SELECT map_id, COUNT(design_id) AS design_count FROM level_designs GROUP BY map_id HAVING COUNT(design_id) > 2 ORDER BY design_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_maps;
SELECT map_name, map_data FROM game_maps WHERE map_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, player_name, action_performed FROM gameplay_logs ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM level_designs WHERE designer_name LIKE 'John%' ORDER BY design_id;
SELECT log_id, map_id, player_name FROM gameplay_logs WHERE player_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_maps;
SELECT map_name, map_data FROM game_maps ORDER BY map_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM level_designs WHERE designer_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY design_id ASC;
SELECT player_name, action_timestamp FROM gameplay_logs WHERE map_id = 1 ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;

SELECT map_name, designer_name, action_performed FROM game_maps JOIN level_designs ON game_maps.map_id = level_designs.map_id JOIN gameplay_logs ON game_maps.map_id = gameplay_logs.map_id WHERE player_name = 'Bob' ORDER BY map_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM maps;
SELECT map_id, map_name FROM maps ORDER BY map_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM levels WHERE level_name = 'Tutorial';
SELECT obstacle_name FROM obstacles WHERE level_id = 1;
SELECT checkpoint_name, level_id FROM checkpoints WHERE checkpoint_id > 5;
SELECT map_id, map_name FROM maps;
SELECT level_name, map_id FROM levels WHERE level_id > 5 ORDER BY level_name DESC;
SELECT checkpoint_name, obstacle_name FROM checkpoints JOIN obstacles ON checkpoints.level_id = obstacles.level_id;
SELECT * FROM levels JOIN maps ON levels.map_id = maps.map_id WHERE map_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT DISTINCT map_name, COUNT(level_id) AS level_count FROM maps JOIN levels ON maps.map_id = levels.map_id GROUP BY map_name HAVING COUNT(level_id) > 2 ORDER BY map_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_maps;
SELECT map_name, map_data FROM game_maps WHERE map_id = 1;
SELECT level_name, level_data FROM level_designs WHERE level_id = 3;
SELECT player_name, total_score FROM player_stats WHERE player_id = 100;
SELECT player_id, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_maps ORDER BY map_id DESC;
SELECT map_name, map_data FROM game_maps WHERE map_id = 3;
SELECT level_name, level_data FROM level_designs WHERE level_id > 5 ORDER BY level_id ASC;
SELECT player_name, total_score FROM player_stats WHERE total_score > 1000;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 2 AND quantity > 5;
